feed.title: Amir Yusoff
feed.subtitle: A computer engineer and a tech enthusiast's repo of random projects.

entry.title: Bypass Unlimited Hotspot
entry.summary: To bypass tethered internet Open Command Prompt (CMD) as administrator. Search for CMD and right click and select run as administrator. copy this code in the CMD and press enter netsh int ipv4 set glob defaultcurhoplimit=65 an “ok” will be prompeted connect your device through usb and tether the internet hopefully everything works!

entry.title: Increase Max File Size Upload for Wordpress in Docker

link.title: Increase Max File Size Upload for Wordpress in Docker

entry.summary: Increase Max File Size Upload for Wordpress in Docker Open terminal List down active containers docker ps Run bash inside the wordpress container docker exec -it <container_name> List all files, including hidden ls -alh Show contents of .htaccess file cat .htaccess Insert php values on empty line with sed sed -i '/^# END WordPress.*/i php_value upload_max_filesize 256M\nphp_val...

entry.title: Wordle Letter Analysis
entry.summary: What is Wordle? Wordle is a free game where you have six tries to guess a five-letter word through deduction. There is one word every day, which is the same for everyone. The new puzzle is released every day at midnight. Each time you guess a word, the letters will turn green, yellow or grey to indicate if it is in the correct spot. Green means the letter is in the right position, yellow means...

entry.title: Deploy Clouflare DDNS on Docker
entry.summary: Docker Compose to install Cloudflare Dynamic Dns on your server version: '2' services: cloudflare-ddns: image: oznu/cloudflare-ddns:latest restart: always environment: - API_KEY=************************** - ZONE=example.com - PROXIED=true - PUID=1000 - PGID=100

entry.title: How to run Chirpy theme in Jekyll web server on macOS

link.title: How to run Chirpy theme in Jekyll web server on macOS

entry.summary: Prerequisites This tutorial is to install and run the Chirpy theme in Jekyll web server for development. This site could be deployed through Github pages for free using Github actions provided in the source code. As of 11/1/2021, this tutorial is valid for instances running macOS Monterey (version 12.1 (21C52)) Installation of dependencies Step 1 - Forking from GitHub Create a new repository...
